casebody.data:
SCHENKEL & SHULTZ
v.
FOX & ASSO. No. 631A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2007. David G. Redding, Adrianne Huffman, Charlotte, for Fox & Associates. Kiran H. Mehta, Seton B. Hunt, Charlotte, Herbert W. Hamilton, Christi P. Cox, for Schenkel & Shultz. Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Troy Chivers. The following order has been entered on the amended motion filed on the 14th day of March 2007 by Plaintiff for Admission of Counsel Pro Hac Vice: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of March 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
